item.title: Intel expands Core Ultra AI chips amidst market competition - TechTarget
item.description:
Intel Expands Core Ultra AI Chips Amidst Market Competition

Date: January 7, 2025 Source: TechTarget

Intel has expanded its Core Ultra AI chips lineup, targeting gamers and graphic designers as it aims to counter competition from AMD and Qualcomm.

  • Introduction of Core Ultra 200HX and H series chips for mobile PCs.
  • Launch coincided with CES 2025 and follows previous releases for business PCs.
  • Market demand for AI PCs remains subdued; shipment dips reported by IDC.
  • Intel anticipates stronger positioning in the AI market with upcoming product launches.
"Without these new chips, they would have fallen far behind the others in the AI PC category," said Jack Gold, principal analyst at J. Gold Associates.

Intel's new processors are designed to enhance both gaming and enterprise computing capabilities as the company gears up for future competition.

item.title: CES 2025: MSI announces laptop series with Nvidia GeForce RTX 50 series GPUs - The Times of India
item.description:
CES 2025: MSI announces laptop series with Nvidia GeForce RTX 50 series GPUs

Publication Date: Not specified
Source: Times of India

This article covers MSI's latest announcements at CES 2025, where they unveiled a series of laptops powered by Nvidia's GeForce RTX 50 series GPUs.

  • MSI's new laptops feature improved graphics performance and enhanced cooling systems.
  • The laptops cater to gamers and content creators with high-performance demands.
  • MSI also highlighted potential advancements in AI-driven gaming experiences.
"The integration of the RTX 50 series GPUs will redefine performance standards in gaming laptops." - MSI Representative

This new laptop series positions MSI strongly in the competitive gaming laptop market, leveraging the capabilities of Nvidia's latest technology.

item.title: OnePlus 13 and 13R launched with Snapdragon 8 Elite chip, 6000 mAh battery. Check India price, features - The Economic Times
item.description:
OnePlus 13 and 13R Launched with Latest Snapdragon Chips and 6-Year Update Timeline

Publication Date: Not specified Source: Not specified

OnePlus has unveiled their latest flagship devices, the OnePlus 13 and OnePlus 13R, both featuring cutting-edge specifications and long-term software support.

Key Points:

  • OnePlus 13 starts at Rs 69,999, while OnePlus 13R starts at Rs 42,999.
  • OnePlus 13 features a 6.8-inch Pro XDR Display, Snapdragon 8 Gen Elite SOC, and a 6000 mAh battery.
  • Both models offer 4 years of OS updates and 6 years of security updates.
  • Camera setup includes multiple 50MP sensors on both devices.
“What are your views on the new launch?”

The introduction of the OnePlus 13 and 13R showcases the brand's commitment to quality and longevity in software support while offering premium features at competitive prices.

item.title: OnePlus Buds Pro 3 gets a new Sapphire Blue colour: Here’s how much it costs - Digit
item.description:
OnePlus Buds Pro 3 gets a new Sapphire Blue colour: Here’s how much it costs

Publication Date: January 10, 2025 Source: Digit

OnePlus has launched a new Sapphire Blue color for its Buds Pro 3 along with the OnePlus 13 series. While no new features have been added, this color complements the existing variants.

  • Features 11mm dynamic drivers and 50dB Adaptive Noise Cancellation.
  • Offers up to 5.5 hours of playback after just a 10-minute charge.
  • Available for Rs 11,999, with discounts available for early purchasers.
"The buds provide 5+ hours of playback after a 10-minute charge, and up to 43 hours with the charging case."

The new Sapphire Blue variant enhances the existing OnePlus Buds Pro 3, further enriching the product lineup with aesthetically appealing options.

item.title: OnePlus 13 With Snapdragon 8 Elite SoC Launched in India Alongside OnePlus 13R: Price, Specifications - Gadgets 360
item.description:
OnePlus 13, OnePlus 13R Debut in India With 6,000mAh Batteries

Publication Date: Tuesday

Source: Gadgets 360

OnePlus has launched its latest smartphones, the OnePlus 13 and OnePlus 13R, featuring powerful Snapdragon chipsets and 6,000mAh batteries with fast charging capabilities.

  • OnePlus 13 features a Snapdragon 8 Elite chipset and a 6.82-inch Quad-HD+ display.
  • Available in multiple RAM and storage configurations, priced from Rs. 69,999.
  • OnePlus 13R is equipped with a Snapdragon 8 Gen 3 chipset, starting at Rs. 42,999.
  • Both models support 5G connectivity and house advanced camera systems.
“The OnePlus 13 has a 6,000mAh battery with 100W wired SuperVOOC charging and 50W wireless charging support.”

In conclusion, the OnePlus 13 and 13R offer advanced features that cater to the demands of modern smartphone users, promising exceptional performance and efficiency.

item.title: Apple says it will update AI feature after inaccurate news alerts - The Guardian
item.description:
Apple says it will update AI feature after inaccurate news alerts

Date & Source: [Publication Date not provided], Source: The Guardian

Apple has announced plans to update an AI feature that has issued misleading news alerts on its iPhones. The tech giant's AI system circulated inaccurate summaries, including false claims about a murder suspect and incorrect news about Rafael Nadal.

  • Apple is working on a software update to clarify when news notifications are generated summaries.
  • A formal complaint was filed by the BBC regarding inaccuracy in the alerts.
  • Recent AI summaries incorrectly announced Nadal's sexual orientation and the results of a darts championship.
  • The BBC emphasized that the AI's summaries contradicted original content, urging Apple to address these issues.
  • ProPublica also highlighted similar inaccuracies involving the New York Times in previous months.
  • The problematic AI feature was released as part of a strategy to compete in the generative AI market.
  • Calls for the removal of the feature have been made by the National Union of Journalists.
“Apple must act swiftly, removing Apple Intelligence to ensure it plays no role in contributing to the misinformation.” - Laura Davison, NUJ General Secretary

The company plans to continue improving the AI feature based on user feedback and insists on the importance of accurate news reporting.

item.title: Galaxy Unpacked 2025: Samsung announces date for Galaxy S25 series, opens pre-reserve - CNBCTV18
item.description:
Galaxy Unpacked 2025: Samsung announces date for Galaxy S25 series, opens pre-reserve

Publication Date: January 2025 | Source: CNBC TV18

Samsung has officially announced that their next Galaxy Unpacked event will take place on January 22 in San Jose, California, focusing on the new Galaxy S25 series.

  • Pre-reservations are now open in India, requiring a token payment of ₹2,000.
  • Early customers can enjoy benefits worth up to ₹5,000.
  • The Galaxy S25 series will include the S25, S25+, S25 Ultra, and a new model, the S25 Slim.
  • The S25 Slim features a thin design, a 6.7-inch QHD+ AMOLED screen, Snapdragon 8 Elite processor, and a 200MP camera.
  • Samsung may unveil an Android XR-based headset at the event.
  • The Galaxy S25 series is expected to hit stores by February 7, 2025.
“Expect Samsung to redefine the smartphone game once again.”

With the impending release and innovative features, Samsung aims to make a significant impact in the smartphone market with the S25 series.

item.title: Valorant patch notes 10.00: New agent Tejo, map pool change, FLEX cosmetics - Dexerto
item.description:
Valorant Patch Notes 10.00

Publication Date: January 8, 2025

Source: Riot Games

Valorant’s patch 10.00 introduces the new agent Tejo, updates to the map pool, and introduces FLEX cosmetics. It also features numerous bug fixes.

  • New Initiator Tejo joins the game with abilities like a sticky grenade and guided missiles.
  • Map pool changes: Fracture and Lotus are back while Ascent and Sunset are removed.
  • Cosmetics customization now includes a FLEX menu, with everyone receiving a default FLEX.
  • Improvements to existing agents’ abilities for consistency and quality of life.
“Tejo is en route. Our newest Initiator from Colombia will be released in a staggered rollout.”

The patch addresses various bugs and enhances the gameplay experience with new features like automatic remake voting in matches.

item.title: CES 2025: HP announces Omen Max 16, OmenAI, and other gaming products - The Times of India
item.description:
CES 2025: HP announces Omen Max 16, OmenAI, and other gaming products

Publication Date: January 6, 2025 Source: Tech News Daily

HP kicked off CES 2025 by unveiling its latest gaming products, including the powerful Omen Max 16 and an innovative AI software dubbed OmenAI.

  • The Omen Max 16 features advanced graphics capabilities, making it a top choice for gamers.
  • OmenAI combines machine learning to enhance gaming performance and player experience.
  • HP emphasized sustainability in its new devices, incorporating eco-friendly materials.
"This is a game-changer for how players interact with their devices." - HP CEO

Overall, HP's announcements at CES 2025 underline its commitment to leading the gaming tech market while focusing on sustainability and user experience.

item.title: OnePlus 13 India Launch LIVE: OnePlus 13, 13R and Buds Pro 3 to debut soon - Mint
item.description:
OnePlus 13 India Launch LIVE: OnePlus 13, OnePlus 13R and OnePlus Buds Pro 3 launch today - expected price and specs

Date: 07 Jan 2025 | Source: OnePlus Official

As OnePlus unveils its latest flagship series, the OnePlus 13, anticipation builds around its powerful features and improvements. This launch includes the OnePlus 13, OnePlus 13R, and the new Buds Pro 3.

  • The OnePlus 13 features a Snapdragon 8 Elite processor along with an impressive 6,000mAh battery and 100W fast charging.
  • Expect a 6.82-inch AMOLED display and enhanced camera capabilities with a triple camera setup.
  • The OnePlus 13R will run on the Snapdragon 8 Gen 3 and includes a 50MP primary camera and improved design.
  • OnePlus Buds Pro 3 will offer spatial audio and advanced noise cancellation with long battery life.
“OnePlus 13 is expected to deliver a great AnTuTu score of approx 3.18 million.”

The event is eagerly anticipated as it promises to showcase significant advancements in mobile technology.

item.title: Amazon announces Great Republic Day sale, starting from January 13: Deals on phones and more - Digit
item.description:
Amazon announces Great Republic Day sale, starting from January 13: Deals on phones and more

Publication Date: Not specified
Source: Digit

Amazon has launched its annual Great Republic Day Sale, scheduled from January 13 to January 19, 2025, with early access for Prime members.

  • The sale starts on January 13, 2025 at 12 PM, with Prime users getting access at midnight.
  • Offers on various smartphone brands, including major discounts on devices such as iQOO, OnePlus, Motorola, and Samsung.
  • SBI credit card users can avail of a 10% instant discount.
“If you are an Amazon Prime user, then the sale will start for you 12 hours before everyone else.”

The Great Republic Day Sale by Amazon presents an opportunity for consumers to snag significant discounts on a wide variety of smartphones, catering to both premium and budget segments.

item.title: Apple urged to withdraw 'out of control' AI news alerts - BBC.com
item.description:
Apple Urged to Withdraw 'Out of Control' AI News Alerts

Publication Date: date not specified Source: BBC

Apple is facing renewed pressure to withdraw an AI feature that generates news alerts, as it has inaccurately summarized content, spreading misinformation.

  • AI feature creates erroneous news alerts on iPhones.
  • Former Guardian editor Alan Rusbridger criticized the technology, calling it "out of control".
  • The BBC has voiced its concerns about misrepresentation of news content.
  • The National Union of Journalists has demanded swift action from Apple to rectify the misinformation issue.
  • Apple acknowledged the problem and plans to clarify the AI-generated summaries.
“Trust in news is low enough already without giant American corporations coming in and using it as a kind of test product,” said Alan Rusbridger.

Apple's update to the AI feature is expected soon, but concerns about misinformation persist among media organizations.

item.title: Realme 14 Pro series with colour changing tech launching soon: 5 key details | Mint - Mint
item.description:
Realme 14 Pro series with colour changing tech launching soon: 5 key details

Publication Date: Soon
Source: Live Mint

Realme is excited to announce the launch of the Realme 14 Pro Series on January 16, 2025, featuring a unique color-changing design activated by temperature.

  • The Realme 14 Pro Series features the world's first temperature-sensitive color-changing design.
  • The devices can change color below 16 degrees Celsius, attracting attention with their unique aesthetic.
  • With a slim profile of 7.55mm, the phones come in various exclusive color options.
  • The series includes an OLED display with a 1.5K resolution and a quad-curved design.
  • Performance-wise, they are expected to be powered by MediaTek and Snapdragon chipsets, with fast charging capabilities of up to 80W.
The Realme 14 Pro is expected to feature a 50-megapixel main shooter, complemented by additional cameras for versatility.

The Realme 14 Pro Series promises to be an exciting addition to the smartphone market, catering to those who appreciate stylish design and innovative technology. Stay tuned for their official unveiling on January 16!

item.title: Galaxy Unpacked on January 22: Samsung opens pre-reservations for S25 series in India - The Financial Express
item.description:
Galaxy Unpacked on January 22: Samsung opens pre-reservations for S25 series in India

Publication Date: January 12, 2025 | Source: Financial Express

Samsung announced today that its next Unpacked event will take place on January 22 in San Jose, California, where the Galaxy S25 series will be revealed.

  • Pre-reservations for the Galaxy S25 series are now live in India.
  • Customers can reserve a unit by paying a refundable amount of Rs 2,000.
  • The pre-reserved customers will receive exclusive launch offers worth up to Rs 5,000.
  • The devices are expected to feature the Qualcomm Snapdragon 8 Elite chip.
  • Samsung will introduce its XR headset, Project Moohan, at the event.
“Pre-reserved customers will be eligible for early access and receive benefits of up to Rs 5,000 on purchasing the new Galaxy S series devices.”

In summary, Samsung is gearing up for an exciting launch with the new Galaxy S series and the introduction of its XR headset.

item.title: Samsung Expands ‘AI for All’ Vision at CES 2025 To Bring AI Everyday, Everywhere - samsung.com
item.description:
Samsung Expands ‘AI for All’ Vision at CES 2025 To Bring AI Everyday, Everywhere

Publication Date: January 2025 | Source: Samsung Press Conference

Samsung Electronics today unveiled its new “AI for All” vision at CES 2025, focusing on making AI an “Everyday, Everywhere” experience.

  • Samsung introduced Home AI to elevate user experiences across connected devices.
  • Security and Privacy features enhanced with Samsung Knox Matrix for better protection.
  • SmartThings integrates AI tech for a personalized smart home experience.
  • AI-driven health insights from devices like Galaxy Ring and Watch.
  • Commitment to accessibility with AI to improve facilities for users with disabilities.
  • Expansion of SmartThings Pro B2B solutions for various industries.
“I’m proud of how we have introduced new technologies and intelligence to the home... we will continue this journey of AI leadership in the home and beyond.” - Jong-Hee (JH) Han, Vice Chairman, CEO

Samsung's initiatives at CES 2025 showcase their commitment to integrating AI across various sectors, aiming for a future where technology enhances everyday life for all.

item.title: CES 2025: Nvidia announces RTX 50 Series GPUs with 2x performance boost and DLSS 4.0 - The Times of India
item.description:
CES 2025: Nvidia announces RTX 50 Series GPUs with 2x performance boost and DLSS 4.0

Publication Date: January 7, 2025
Source: Times of India

Nvidia has announced the launch of its RTX 50 Series GPUs at CES 2025, featuring a significant performance increase and the integration of DLSS 4.0 technology.

  • Introduction of RTX 50 Series GPUs with double the performance of previous models.
  • New DLSS 4.0 technology promises enhanced graphics rendering.
  • Improvements aimed at both gamers and professionals in graphic-intensive applications.
  • Expected release date and pricing to be announced later this year.
“This new generation sets a new standard for performance and visual fidelity,” said Nvidia's CEO.

The unveiling of the RTX 50 Series at CES 2025 marks another milestone in Nvidia's commitment to pushing graphics technology forward, appealing to a wide range of users from gamers to creative professionals.

item.title: Samsung Brings ‘Vision AI’ Features For Smart TVs And Home At CES 2025: All Details - News18
item.description:
Samsung Introduces Vision AI for Smart TVs at CES 2025

Date: January 07, 2025
Source: News18

Samsung is showcasing its latest AI advancements at CES 2025, introducing a range of features for its Smart TVs termed ‘Vision AI’.

  • New AI features include real-time content translation and personalized content recommendations through partnerships with Microsoft and Google.
  • Generative Wallpaper allows for personalized artwork display.
  • The company is also enhancing its Home AI ecosystem aimed at a hyper-personalized smart home experience.
  • Other offerings include a flagship Neo QLED 8K TV model boasting advanced AI capabilities.
"The company is bringing AI to homes as well with the Home AI ecosystem that looks to unify the UI experience and features across different products available in the segment."

This launch marks a significant step in integrating AI into home entertainment and technology ecosystems.
